statements: UPDATE spa_reservation SET appointment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE reservation_id = 1;
UPDATE spa_reservation SET appointment_time = '10:00:00' WHERE reservation_id = 2;
UPDATE spa_reservation SET preference_1 = 'Massage' WHERE reservation_id = 3;
UPDATE spa_reservation SET appointment_date = '2023-09-15', appointment_time = '10:00:00' WHERE reservation_id = 101
UPDATE spa_reservation SET customer_id = 201, preference_1 = 'Massage', preference_2 = 'Hot Stone Massage' WHERE reservation_id = 102
UPDATE spa_reservation SET appointment_date = '2023-10-20', customer_id = 301, preference_1 = 'Facial' WHERE reservation_id = 103
UPDATE spa_appointments SET therapist_id = 101 WHERE appointment_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET favorite_service = 'Massage' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE spa_appointments SET time_slot = '10:00:00' WHERE therapist_id = (SELECT favorite_therapist_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 101);

UPDATE customer_preferences SET wellness_goal = 'Relaxation' WHERE customer_id = 101;

UPDATE services SET price = 50.00 WHERE service_id = 3;
UPDATE spa_reservations SET therapist='Anna Smith', service='Swedish Massage' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND appointment_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE customers SET phone_number='+1234567890', age=35 WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE services SET price=50.00, duration='01:30:00' WHERE service_name = 'Deep Tissue Massage';

UPDATE spa_services SET service_price = 75.00 WHERE service_id = 1;
